sourcesContent:
import dateNormalization from "../utils/functions" import { AiFillStar, AiFillProfile, AiFillHeart } from "react-icons/ai"; const Card = ({ data, handleIdSearch }) => { return (
handleIdSearch(data.id, data.name ? "tv" : 'movie')}>

{data.name ? `${data.name} ` : `${data.title} `}

{data.first_air_date ? dateNormalization(data.first_air_date) : dateNormalization(data.release_date)}

{data.vote_average}%

) } export default Card
